description: Defines the RatingOverlayHost interface which provides hooks for displaying a rating overlay and handling navigation in a media playback app.

classes.name: RatingOverlayHost
classes.description: An interface specifying methods for displaying a rating overlay and navigating to other UI screens, implemented by MainActivity.

methods.name: navigateToVcard
methods.description: Navigates to a vCard or post-rating detail screen.

methods.name: showEndPlayer
methods.description: Returns to the end player or main playback area.
